contrasts.commentary: Negative language leans on get, not to frame blame or frustration, while positive talk gravitates to win, nfl to emphasize momentum and credit.
Negative language leans on game, nfl to frame blame or frustration, while positive talk gravitates to get, game to emphasize momentum and credit.

recommendations.message: Anchor updates on tangible progress and address recurring pain points directly.
Balance highlight reels with explanations of decision-making to satisfy both praise- and critique-oriented viewers.
Lean into moments fans already celebrate and preempt the known friction areas with context threads.
